Name: LU 8 - Landmarks, Seaside Park & Community Arts Center Special Permit, Brooklyn (C 260027 PPK).
Title: Application number C 260027 PPK (Seaside Park & Community Arts Center Special Permit) submitted by the NYC Department of Citywide Administrative Services and the New York City Economic Development Corporation, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the disposition of one city-owned property located on Block 7071, Lots 27, 28, 30, 32, 34, 76, 79, 81, 130, 142, 200, 226, 231, 300, and p/o Lot 123, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 13, Council District 47.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
